text: 4.11 Closure Properties of Recursive languages I. The following operations are not closed for recursive languages: e Subset e Substitution e Homomorphism e Finite substitution e Infinite union e Infinite intersection e Infinite concatenation e Infinite difference e Infinite substitution 1I. The following operations are closed for recursive languages: e Complement e Difference e Finite difference o Infinite followed by U, N, -, o, , f e Remember not closed operations
